website_summaries.verdict: A durable and roomy acrylic bathtub with an impressive 86-gallon capacity.
pros: Constructed from glossy white fiberglass-reinforced acrylic
Easy to install with illustrated step-by-step guide
Wide and deep enough for 2 people
cons: Some felt that the base was not strong enough
A few reports of installation problems

customer_reviews.title: The tub is beautiful, seems solid
customer_reviews.text: The tub is beautiful, seems solid, the 3 stars is because the drain connector is a piece of clear plastic thst appears to be easy to break. Plumber had to retrofit a metal pipe to connect to drain as there is no way this one would last long. Had they included a durable drain connect, I'd have given 5 stars because it is a beautiful tub.
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tub
customer_reviews.text: After researching tubs for a couple of months we purchased this one. It arrived in great condition and is very clean, sleek modern, the color is beautiful polar white. It was very easy to install and made with quality materials. I would highly recommend this tub; it is the quality and appearance of tubs 3 or 4 times the cost
customer_reviews.author: B. van Dam

customer_reviews.title: This tub is heaven.
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this tub! The only reason it didn’t get 5 starts in comfort is because it’s almost too big. (I never thought I’d say that about a tub.) I slide down into this tub and could / have spent hours in it, just adding in warm water. I NEVER fill the tub all the way. I actually haven’t even filled it half way yet and it’s still great. All of my friends are obsessed and so am I. This tub is a statement piece and looks fantastic in my renovated bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: abmn

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough good things about this tub, and I waited until I could be certain.
customer_reviews.text: It took five months waiting until the new addition was ready for the fixtures. I went bonkers waiting. We built this 650 sq. foot bath for this tub, in many ways, windows and all. I never expexted it to be so comfortable. I have had some long baths in this tub. Freestanding, the water stays warm with much greqter ease. Done draiining it cleans up nicely. I filled a spray bottle with water and a very small amount of quality liquid soap. A light owiping with a plastic scrubber, rinse and you're set. This tub has had a 100% admiration and envy list counting everyone who'a aeen it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Beyerl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this there weren’t many reviews. I had limited space, wanted quality but wasn’t as concerned about size because I don’t plan to use it. I bought it mainly because I know for resell I needed to keep a tub. It is small. I’m 5’9” and when I sit my feet can’t lay completely out. But it’s beautiful. I read the was light, and that’s true. But my contractor was able to mount to the ground well.
customer_reviews.author: Jhannah

customer_reviews.title: Leaky drain plug!!
customer_reviews.text: After installing the 67" tub the ceiling started to leak!! We had to cut open the ceiling and remove the tub too. The factory drain outlet had a cheap plastic ring that was the causing of the leak. My plumber had to remove the drain plug and install puty to fix the problem. Highly recommend doing that if you want to purchase this tub.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.... ahhhhh.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to leave an honest review so I waited until it was installed and used a few times. This is the best purchase I’ve made on Amazon. Easy to install, durable (my husband used it as a tool bucket during construction) , comfortable and just stunning. I absolutely love my new bathroom and my new tub!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy for smaller tub
customer_reviews.text: This tub is very comfortable for a smaller size. I have not filled the tub to its highest level yet. No need to. I am 5'5" and can fit comfortably in the tub sitting up with back reclined against the tub and legs straight out. My husband installed the tub, so not sure about how easy it was to install, but do know this manufacturer provided a metal drain connection rather than a flexible plastic one. The tub arrived in a timely manner as advertised. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Phippen

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub! It’s the same quality for half the price of most box stores. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging on this tub is top notch. Very thick cardboard reinforced at the corners. The tub arrived in perfect condition, unlike the first one I ordered from a different company. It is going to fit perfectly in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: AliG

customer_reviews.title: All over good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and how easy it is to move. The bottom is narrow when standing so make sure to measure and compare.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality products made in China ?? All drain parts is useless no fit also. How can I return this product?
customer_reviews.author: Min S Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is gorgeous! Great price and looks expensive! I haven’t had a chance to take a bath in it because I’m still waiting for my house to be finished, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MHA

customer_reviews.title: Freddy freestanding bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Love the appeal of the tub, fits perfectly for my application. The quality of the tub similar or better than much more expensive tubs. Easy to install, recommend to anyone looking to add a stylish tub to there bathroom design.
customer_reviews.author: mark evans

customer_reviews.title: I can get my whole body wet at once
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the bathtub. I am 5' 1" tall and I can float in the bathtub. I am having 2 steps built to easily get in and out of the tub but it is not absolutely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING BUT HAVEN'T USED YET
customer_reviews.text: This tub is gorgeous and fits beautifully in the new Master Bath. I haven't actually used it yet but I'm sure I will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub,  great value
customer_reviews.text: This bath tub is everything it looks like in the picture! It's comfortable to bathe in, keeps the water temperature consistent, and looks amazing. Everybody thinks we spent much more than we did. Our contractor complimented the design and said it was a great tub and easy to install. I highly recommend this tub.
customer_reviews.author: crystal scholten

customer_reviews.title: great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: light weight and comfortable but we had issue with leaking. we were able to fix the leakage by replacing the plastic parts with metals and lots of silicone!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Wong

customer_reviews.title: The whole top of the tub cracked it is not very well built I sat on the end and it cracked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality Tub cracked after 9 months already whole top section on the end when we sat on the end. Cant believe it I just sat down on the end because of hot water and the whole top end cracked very sad now need to replace the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Art R Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but very difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but very difficult to install. Took multiple different plumbers to figure out how to get it installed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eicks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great buy!
customer_reviews.text: You in arrived well packed, on time and with professional delivery. It is beautiful and I loved be it! I found this tub to be very roomy and an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: ddependable2012

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Smart and sleek look, great value for the $$ considering it includes the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E. Sewa

customer_reviews.title: So far so good waiting on plumber. Beautiful Tub.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good waiting on plumber. Beautiful tub Amazon has been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mparker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tub
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were hoping for and for the price you cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaynna basham

customer_reviews.title: Missing The Stopper
customer_reviews.text: We love this bathtub, it is perfect for our remodeled bathroom. It's roomy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bathtub and fits our space perfectly! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, comfortable tub
customer_reviews.text: Great tub!! Right size for 5’2” and near height. Really comfortable shed deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sangita S

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tub!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Smooth clean modern lines with a classic feel.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub!
customer_reviews.text: Great tub! Wife loves it!! Very stylish and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: WESLEY M. CAUDILL

customer_reviews.title: Good sized freestanding tub!
customer_reviews.text: Good affordable freestanding tub. This was easy to install. The tub is a good size with comfortable side angles for relaxing. I am 5’6’’ and I am able to fully extend my legs in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Install not complete but lives up to all the good reviews so far!
customer_reviews.text: This review based strictly on look and feel after delivery - will update later after install. It’s true to other reviews - beautiful, seems sturdy and well made and comfortable. For now, it still checks all the boxes!
customer_reviews.author: D. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving Sleekness
customer_reviews.text: We put this tub in our bathroom to replace a huge, jacuzzi tub that was taking up too much space. We like the size and the sleekness of the design. It’s definitely a tub for only 1 person though and it doesn’t contour to your body like other tubs - but if you aren’t someone who soaks often, I think it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tub with a beautiful price
customer_reviews.text: Product was received quickly. I originally ordered a bigger one but because of an issue with the remodelling I had to send that one back and order the smaller version. Received with no issue but haven't installed the tub yet. Once it is installed then I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Size, depth and insulation to help water stay hot!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new soaking tub installed and I totally LOVE it! Water stays hot for a long time! We tore out a 60 year old tub out and put this beauty in, made a very modern usable space! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: E Adams

customer_reviews.title: Water Leaks on floor.
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service is not desirable. The Drain is still leaking. We took the tub to a licensed and bonded Tub Repair in Wenatchee, WA. Repaired the overflow, as it was not secure and had holes in it. After many conversations with manufacturer and Amazon. We live in Moses Lake, WA. Hour and a half away. Picked it up and reinstalled. I would not recommend this purchase to anyone. Quality is sub-par, Customer service has no resolutions. The Drain is still leaking. It has been since July that we've had it installed. My Husband has tirelessly been trying to solve this mystery. Can anyone help? Sincerely, Christine M
customer_reviews.author: Dave W. Dinges

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I seriously do not know how there are so many five stars for this (unless the manufacturer is writing in). I have read numerous complaints with this manufacturer that the drain hose is cheap and leaks and the overflow leaks. Guess what - both of ours do as well. Cannot return. Cannot get any customer service. They provide you with an email address that is not valid and if you put an inquiry in on their websites, they do nothing. You cannot find any parts to work with this tub either. Went through several plumbers. DO NOT BUY. Gave it one star because I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find toilet to match. Sad day!
customer_reviews.text: More of a question for anyone, having trouble getting toilet to match? Anyone have a idea on a bright white toilet to match? Since they sit together it’s very noticeable that the toilet is Kohlar whits but not as white as tub. Love the look of tub but can’t match a toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Alvia Redman

product_meta.title: FerdY Freestanding Bathtub 67" x 31" Classic Oval Shape Freestanding Soaking Acrylic Bathtub, F-02522 Modern White, cUPC Certified, Drain & Overflow Assembly Included (F-02522-67'')
feature_bullets: 🛀 CLASSIC DESIGN: Clean, elegant, and contained, FerdY 522 expresses contemporary beauty and simplicity. This freestanding bath lets you indulge in a deep and immersive soak as you relax against the sloped lumbar support. The cast resin material allows for dynamic curvatures and for crisp, hand-finished details that are rich with character. FerdY gloss cast resin is lightweight and easy to clean, with a high-gloss finish that guarantees our product will last for years to come.

🛀 A PERFECT BATHING EXPERIENCE: 67-inch in length. 15-inch soaking depth. Sloped lumbar support offers extra comfort while bathing. Integrated slotted overflow allows for deep soaking. Toe-tap drain with FerdY gloss cover.

🛀 TOP CLASS MATERIAL: 100% glossy white acrylic reinforced with fiberglass for long-lasting durability. Environmentally friendly material, non-toxic, non-cracking, high gloss, and durable finish. Easy to clean, and resistant to a wide range of household chemicals and cosmetic products. Guaranteed long durability, and to always look as bright and clean as new.

🛀 EASY INSTALLATION: Illustrated guide with step-by-step instructions makes installation easy. Adjustable leveling feet are included to stabilize the tub to any surface. Brass and plastic drainpipes are included. The plastic drain connectors can scale up to 32 inches. Its anti-sliding gasket effectively prevents water leakage and adjusts to different floor drain requirements.

🛀 FAST AND EFFICIENT AFTER-SALES EXPERIENCE: cUPC certified products. We are committed to providing our customers with excellent after-sales service. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
